General.Name: Amcomri Entertainment Inc
General.Description: Amcomri Entertainment Inc., through its subsidiaries, finances, produces, sells, and distributes feature films and documentaries, and scripted and unscripted television series worldwide.  The company is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1800-510 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6B 0M3
